metadata.title: Tuesday, 3rd November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.question_text: why the inputs under the Farmer Input Support Programme for Mpongwe District for the 2015/2016 farming season have been reduced by four thousand packs; and whether the Government would consider maintaining the same quantities previously provided.
whether the Government is aware that Luankuni Bridge in Mpongwe District is on the brink of collapsing thereby posing a danger to the travelling public; and when the Bridge will be worked on.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing when Milenge District Council will be provided with a motor  vehicle.

questions.question_text: when the Mansa-Milambo road in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency will be upgraded to bituminous standard; and what has caused the delay in upgrading the road. ORDER OF THE DAY 1        Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply. Heads 07/01, 07/02, 07/03, 07/04, 07/05, 07/06, 07/07, 07/08, 07/09, 07/10, 07/22, 08/01, 08/03, 08/04, 08/05, 08/06, 08/07, 08/08, 08/10, 04/01, 04/02, 04/03, 04/04, 04/05, 12/01 and 12/02 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 07       -        Office of the Auditor-General Head 08       -        Cabinet Office – Office of the President Head 04       -        Ministry of Gender Head 12       -        Commission for Investigations – Office of the President _________________________
